articles.title: Los Angeles Rams, Matthew Stafford, wife Kelly to cover photographer's hospital bills after fall from stage - ESPN
articles.description: The Rams, Matthew Stafford and his wife, Kelly, said they will cover a photographer's hospital bills and replace her cameras after she fell off the stage at the team's Super Bowl celebration.
articles.content: The Los Angeles Rams, quarterback Matthew Stafford and his wife, Kelly, said Thursday that they would pay a photographer's medical bills and replace her cameras after she fell off the stage at the te… [+1022 chars]
